member.name: F:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.DP
member.summary:
DP is a HashMap (Dictionary) which will be used to organize all the depenendents. Every element that has dependants will be added to DP as a key. It's associated value is a HashSet containing it's dependants.
For example, if ("a", "b") is in the DG, "a" will be the key, and its value is a HashSet containing "b"

member.name: P:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.Size
member.summary: The number of ordered pairs in the DependencyGraph.

member.name: P:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.Item(System.String)
member.summary: The size of dependees(s). This property is an example of an indexer. If dg is a DependencyGraph, you would invoke it like this: dg["a"] It should return the size of dependees("a")

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.AddDependee(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: When adding a dependant, we must also update the dependee list.

members.member:
Adds the ordered pair (s,t), if it doesn't exist
This should be thought of as:
t depends on s
s must be evaluated first. T depends on S t cannot be evaluated until s is ///

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.RemoveDependency(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the ordered pair (s,t), if it exists

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.RemoveConnection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to remove (s,t) from both DE and DP

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.RemoveDependee(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes ordered pair ("s", "t") from dependee list if it exists

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.ReplaceDependents(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Removes all existing ordered pairs of the form (s,r). Then, for each t in newDependents, adds the ordered pair (s,t).

member.name: M:SpreadsheetUtilities.DependencyGraph.ReplaceDependees(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Removes all existing ordered pairs of the form (r,s). Then, for each t in newDependees, adds the ordered pair (t,s).
